string.value: I need 3 of Rombot's Memory Cards so #bPorter#k of Omega Sector can decipher them.
Porter made a colossal mistake and destroyed one of Rombot's Memory Cards. I can't believe I just trusted this man to do this job!

(Sniff sniff~) Man, I've been suffering from cold for months now...but then, hey, did #b#p2051001##k, the engineer at the Silo, really requested for #b3 #t4031118#s#k? Then please give me the #b3 #t4000124#s#k (Sniff sniff~). I'll try to decipher this, and make it into #t4031118#.

Hmmm... #b#p2051001##k the engineer at Silo requested for the deciphering of #b#t4000124##k, right? (Sniff sniff~) Yes, it's possible, but I've been suffering from crazy cold lately. (Sniff sniff~) I'll have to try this, first (Sniff sniff~) Hmmm... then please send me the #b3 #t4000124#s#k. Let's see ...

(Sniff sniff~) Man, I've been suffering from cold for months now...but then, hey, did #b#p2051001##k, the engineer at the Silo, really requested for #b3 #t4031118#s#k? Then please give me the #b3 #t4000124#s#k (Sniff sniff~). I'll try to decipher this, and make it into #t4031118#.
